name: Adobe InDesign Menu Set File
summary: Learn about .INMS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The default menu set cannot be modified. Instead, save a copy of the default menu set as a new INMS file and then modify it.

description: Settings file used by Adobe InDesign, a program used to create professional page layouts; contains the hide or show settings for menu items, as well as the location of the menu items; used for customizing the user interface.
